Class EdgedShape

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Shape
        |
        +--EdgedShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, DrawableElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilledShape, LineShape
public abstract class EdgedShape
extends Shape
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The EdgedShape class represents shapes that have an edge color in 2D space. The color is specified through a Color object.

See Also:
Color
